issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix autoColumnStats tests to make auto stats gather possible.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Put dynamic sort partition optimization under cost based decision

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HIVE-20703 put dynamic sort partition optimization under cost based decision, but it also makes the optimizer only available to tez. hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition works with other execution engines for a long time, we should keep the optimizer available to them.
fields.summary: Make dynamic sort partition optimization available to HoS and MR

ATTACHMENT ID: 12949894 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

The two whitespace issues are all related to q.out file, we'd better not change them:
./ql/src/test/results/clientpositive/spark/auto_sortmerge_join_16.q.out_spark:445:169	val_169	NULL	day1	1
./ql/src/test/results/clientpositive/spark/auto_sortmerge_join_16.q.out_spark:450:374	val_374	NULL	day1	1

This patch makes sort dynamic partitions available for MR and HoS by using property hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition.threshold
It uses the same cost based algorithm introduced by HIVE-20703 . We can improve the algorithm for MR and HoS with other jiras. 
[~pvary] , [~ngangam] could you review the patch? Thanks
Change looks good to me. +1
Committed into master, thanks [~ngangam] for the review.

[~ychena], [~ngangam] This patch have broken auto column stats collection. It doesn't seem to happen anymore!
[ql/src/test/results/clientpositive/autoColumnStats_6.q.out|https://github.com/apache/hive/commit/9f2e8e61f3cf456420cfb461504cdfa076b96f6e#diff-e5ca628c543044b9188f64378e677accL64]
Please reopen this ticket or open a new one to fix the regression!

[~kgyrtkirk], 
This patch enables dynamic sort partition optimization, and current cost based algorithm and the default value of hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition.threshold=0 will make this test use this optimization (the query plan will be different). If you set hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition.threshold=-1, the query plan will be the same as before. 
With the optimizer, there is no group by step, so there is no compute stats part.
I will create a jira to update the test to use set hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition.threshold=-1, is that OK [~kgyrtkirk] ?

sorry; but I don't understand what do you mean by that.

* these tests are there to test "auto column stats collection" ; which pre-existed before this ticket.
* I don't think any new feature is expected to break existing ones
* removing "that groupby" along with that compute_stats() call is essential removes column stats gathering ; which makes it inoperable.

{quote}I will create a jira to update the test to use set hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition.threshold=-1, is that OK Zoltan Haindrich ?{quote}

Sorry, but I don't think that would be a good idea...I might be misinterpreting your comments/point of view. cc: [~jcamachorodriguez], [~ashutoshc]

[~kgyrtkirk], the optimizer uses one reducer to sort the output and put it into one file (one for each partition, so no need for group by). The behavior is always like this. You can check old patch(not-checked in) which try to enable the optimizer by default, enable the optimizer will remove the auto gather thing. 
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12898098/HIVE-17935.7.patch#file-5
This is a known bug with dynamic sorted partition optimization. I am currently working on fixing it. (HIVE-16100).
[~vgarg], thanks for clarifying.
